    };
    var el = document.getElementById('ghost');
    var blinkCount = 0;
    function show(k) { el.textContent = frames[k]; }
    function blink(cb) {
      show('half_normal');
      setTimeout(function () {
        show('shut_normal');
        setTimeout(function () {
          show('half_normal');
          setTimeout(function () {
            show('open_normal');
            if (cb) cb();
          }, 80);
        }, 120);
      }, 80);
    }
    function yawn() {
      show('half_yawn1');
      setTimeout(function () {
        show('shut_yawn2');
        setTimeout(function () {
          show('half_yawn3');
          setTimeout(function () {
            show('open_normal');
            blinkCount = 0;
            scheduleNext();
          }, 400);
        }, 800);
      }, 400);
    }
    function doSequence() {
      blink(function () {
        blinkCount++;
        if (blinkCount >= 3) { setTimeout(yawn, 900); }
        else { scheduleNext(); }
      });
    }
    function scheduleNext() { setTimeout(doSequence, 4000); }
    show('open_normal');
    scheduleNext();
})();
</script>
